plot: "Farmer Jones is seen coming into the dock at Pleasure Bay in his flat-bottomed boat, by two bathing girls on mischief bent. They swim out to him and start to tease him by tipping his boat....
title: How Farmer Jones Made a Hit at Pleasure Bay
